DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of Remote Ischemic Preconditioning on cognitive function in patients undergoing cardiac surgery compared to control intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Remote Ischemic Preconditioning on Cognitive Function After Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patient undergoing heart surgery on cardiopulmonary bypass Emergency cases Myocardial infarction up to 7 days prior to enrollment Stroke up to 2 months prior to enrollment Ejection fraction less than 30% Previous psychiatric and neurological illness Inability to give informed consent
